string.name: permission_reason_bluetooth_use
string.value: Allow the app to use Bluetooth for managing device connections.

string.name: permission_reason_bluetooth_discover
string.value: Allow the app to discover and pair with nearby Bluetooth devices.

string.name: permission_reason_bluetooth_access
string.value: Allow the app to access Bluetooth functions for data transfer.

string.name: permission_reason_location_coarse
string.value: Allow the app to access your approximate location for Bluetooth scanning.

string.name: permission_reason_location_precise
string.value: Allow the app to access your precise location for Bluetooth interactions.
